    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static al_Examples loadIrisData()
      Demonstrate loading an example set from a URL; uses the trunk version of aima-data found at http://aima-data.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/iris.csv.
      static al_Examples loadRestaurantData()
      Demonstrate loading an example set from a URL; uses the trunk version of aima-data found at http://aima-data.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/restaurant.csv.
      void setUp()
      Setup a 50-count example set, each of the form: { "String": "...", "Number": 0.28489 (random), "Boolean": true (random), "Count": 17 (i) }
      void testDeviationAndMean()
      Check mean and standard deviation with data at http://aima-data.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/iris.txt
      void testEntropy()
      Test whether entropy is calculated correctly
      void testFind()
      Demonstrate find() usage
      void testGet()
      Demonstrate how to retrieve examples and attributes
      void testGetPossibleAttributes()
      Demonstrate getPossibleAttributes() usage; the method should create an entry for every (name, value) combination.
      void testGetValuesOf()
      Demonstrate usage of getValuesOf(); we know that the "String" attribute should only have one distinct value, see setUp()
      void testInformationGain() 
      void testLoadFrom() 
      void testSize()
      Demonstrate how to find sizes of examples
      void testSplitBy()
      Demonstrate usage of splitBy(); should split the set by attribute value.
